About

Sometimes, you need to include a code snippet (or even a whole code listing!) in a text document. It can be hard to make code look good in this context, and no-one wants to do syntax highlighting by hand.

Code Red makes it easy to include pretty highlighted code in your documents. Paste, drop or upload some text, files or even folders, copy the result and go!

Tested with Google Docs and Microsoft Word, but should work with any rich text editor that supports pasting HTML data.
